DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether treatment axilla ( area arm ) safely minimize omit axillary surgery full axillary radiation therapy replace radiation therapy breast low axilla .
DOC.brief_title: Tangential Radiation Therapy Without Axillary Dissection Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: - Patients undergone conservative breast surgery without axillary dissection prior enrollment study . - Patients receive radiation therapy breast , include low axillary lymph node , period 6 1/2 week . - No radiation specifically direct toward upper axilla supraclavicular lymph node . - Patients also receive 5 year tamoxifen another type hormone therapy determine medical oncologist . - Follow-up visit occur every 6 month mammograms every 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Patients must clinical stage I II breast cancer , clinically uninvolved axillary node . Patients must 55 year old . Patients must undergo total excision primary invasive tumor Final pathologic margin status must negative Only estrogen receptor ( ER ) progesterone receptor ( PR ) positive tumor permit Prior history malignancy , except nonmelanoma skin cancer carcinoma situ fo cervix
